# Description

In upgrade work, we need a quick way to get an overview over the
asset-centric resource in a project.


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/058e7479-577e-48a1-8171-a339c46c46d0)

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] The `cdf profile asset-centric` command now also shows
relationships and labels.
